column5: Hey  I have been looking online but to no avail.  I am looking for the line class records for Lake Trout, be it ontario, canada or the world.  Does anyone know a link to them or know the records?  thanks
Hello  Here is a link to the IGFa  Good Luck  http://wrec.igfa.org/  Dave
I checked that out, but i have to pay to see the all the line class records.
don't know if this is what you were looking for but this might help...  http://www.canadianarcticfishing.com/en/news/records.html
thats exactly what i am looking for!  thanks
